main event: Several sightings of unidentified flying objects in Keesler AFB, Mississippi during August 1952.
interesting points: A round, white object was seen shooting downward with a trail like dying pyrotechnics,Four objects were observed in 'V' formation traveling at 1,000 to 1,500 mph, The objects were very bright and metallic, No trails or exhausts were noted during the sightings, Witness reports included one observer describing a bright light moving in a horizontal direction before curving downward.
sighted object: round, white object; four bright objects in V formation; bright light
witness description: Airman First Class Gerald T. McCabe, Capt. G. W. Gorman, Lt. Gerald F. McCain
